_header: O Father of high majesty / O Son and Holy Ghost all three
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Trinity — three quatrains including refrain, ‘Te deum laudamus’ and burden: ‘Synge we alle thys tyme thus / Te deum laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O fader of high maiesteO sonne and holigost all
                    thre…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Only by loue as seyeth owre credeTe deum
                    laudamus

            1977: 207; 1977, 183.
